weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm white and cold. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of frozen water.
🧤 You need to wear gloves when I'm around.
☃️ You can build a snowman with me.

weather.question: I am wet, and I fall from the sky. Umbrellas keep you dry from me. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ I often come from clouds.
💦 Puddles form when I fall.
🌱 Plants need me to grow.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow, and I come out during the day. I help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I am a star.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.
🌻 Flowers turn towards me.

weather.question: I blow through the trees and make the leaves dance. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I can be gentle or strong.
🪁 I can help you fly a kite.
🍃 You can feel me but not see me.

weather.question: I am a big, white, fluffy thing in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am made of water droplets.
🐑 I sometimes look like sheep.
🌧️ I can block the sun.

weather.question: I am a storm with very strong winds and rain. I spin around and around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have a name.
🏡 I can damage houses.
🌊 I form over warm ocean water.

weather.question: I am a flash of light in the sky during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am often followed by a loud noise.
🌩️ I am electricity in the sky.
🌳 It is dangerous to stand under trees during me.

weather.question: I am a cold, icy rain. I bounce when I hit the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am frozen precipitation.
🤕 Sometimes I can hurt if I hit you.
🏌️ I am bigger than sleet but smaller than a snowball.

weather.question: I am a mix of snow and rain. It's not quite snow, and not quite rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌨️ I am often associated with colder temperatures.
🧊 I am partially melted snow.
🥶 It feels very cold when I land on you.

weather.question: I appear after the rain when the sun shines through the water droplets in the air. I have many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I am an arc of light.
☀️💧 I need both the sun and the rain to exist.
🍀 Some people believe there's a pot of gold at my end.

bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I like sweet things.
🐝 I make a buzzing sound.
🍯 Sometimes, I make honey.

bug.question: I am a tiny insect that marches in lines. I can lift things many times my own weight. What am I?

hints.text: 🏘️ I live in a colony.
🥪 I might steal your picnic.
💪 I am very strong for my size.

bug.question: I have beautiful wings and fly from flower to flower. I start as a caterpillar. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I go through a big change.
🌈 My wings are colorful.
🌸 I help pollinate flowers.

bug.question: I hop around in grassy fields and make a chirping sound. I have long back legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🎵 I can make music.
🌱 I like to eat plants.
🦵 I am good at jumping.

bug.question: I am a small, round beetle with spots on my back. People say I bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am often red with black spots.
🍀 Some people think I bring good fortune.
🌱 I eat other little bugs that harm plants.

bug.question: I glow in the dark and come out at night. People like to catch me in jars. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I can light up.
🌙 I am active when it's dark.
✨ My light is used to attract a mate.

bug.question: I build a sticky web to catch my food. I have eight legs, not six. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I am an arachnid.
🕷️ I can be big or small.
🪰 I eat insects that get trapped in my home.

bug.question: I leave my shell behind as I grow, hiding it on trees or fences. I make a loud buzzing noise in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 My sound is very distinctive in the summer.
🌳 I spend most of my life underground.
🍂 I shed my skin.

bug.question: I am a master of disguise, blending in with leaves and twigs. I eat other insects. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I look like part of a plant.
👀 I have excellent camouflage.
🦗 I am a predator.

bug.question: I am a small insect that can cause itchy bites. I feed on blood. What am I?

hints.text: 💉 I need blood to survive.
🦟 I have a long, thin mouth for piercing skin.
🖐️ People often swat at me.
